item.title: IVF Experiments That Mix And Match Multiple Adults’ DNA Are Bad For Kids And Society
item.description: Scientists are paving the way for people in polyamorous relationships to commission the creation of children with their DNA.

item.title: Messy New Jersey Voter Rolls Have More Than 32,000 ‘Questionable’ Voter Records, Report Says
item.description: After reviewing New Jersey’s voter roll, PILF found an “urgent need for improved list maintenance practice.”

item.title: The Alcaraz-Sinner Rivalry Is Kicking Off A New Generation Of Tennis Greats
item.description: The next golden age of men’s tennis is unfolding before our very eyes, and that should make everyone happy — including the pickleball players.
